titleStmt.title: A true and faithful testimony concerning John Samm the servant of the Lord who finished his course by laying down his life in Northampton Goal for the truth of Jesus, the 26th of the 1st month, 1664 ... / written by John Crook.
titleStmt.author: Crook, John, 1617-1699.
Greene, Thomas, 1634?-1699.

notesStmt.note: Includes also (p. 11-14) Thomas Green's testimony on John Samm.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
